The police have decided to punish an Ansung policeman for sexually assaulting one of Shin's female companions and a policeman for failing to take initial measures after receiving a report from a taxi driver who informed him that he had taken the fugitive Shin to Seoul. The police may send Shin to the prosecutor's office as early as next week. … [Read more...] about Results of Shin Chang-won Inquiry Released

Ha Tae-shin, the assistant public information director of the NPA said that the agency is planning to send out press material to foreign media companies in Korea, as it appears they were not well informed of Shin's criminal activities, noting that Shin gave no money to anybody, but spent it on himself and his girlfriends. … [Read more...] about Police Furious at Reuters ‘Robin Hood’ Report

"[Shin Chang-won] continuously said that he loved me and that he would carry me on his back when we would go outside. He also said that he would cook for me while referring to cookbooks. He said that he would not regret it even were he to get arrested right before my eyes." … [Read more...] about Fugitive’s Female Friends

Officers circulated 10,000 pictures of Shin who has grown his hair and put on weight, and looks totally different from original wanted posters. Shin has apparently been living with a woman identified as Chung who works at a tea room in Cheonan since April, but witnesses swore that because of the change in his appearance nobody recognized him. … [Read more...] about Police Search Cheonan for Shin Chang-won
